ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Bard Epic quest
ygData.msgSnippet: **i think it is 75%.  i get +120 to resists with psalms (this singing **increase **is almost certainly an oversight and will be fixed) and i think they **do
ygData.messageBody:
**i think it is 75%. i get +120 to resists with psalms (this singing
**increase
**is almost certainly an oversight and will be fixed) and i think they **do
upper 60s normally, so something like 68 to 120 is 75%. good luck **on the
scale. all 3 times we killed gorenarire she had a scale, **phew. one for
each bard in the guild =)
**
**Shada, new owner of dragon claw main gauche AND veldrak's
**shortsword...which do i use!?


Heheh not sure if you know this, but Gorenaire has yet to die on Veeshan. I
took part in 2 failed attempts with FoH, and know of at least 3 other tries.
This was pre-fear fix I think, not sure. This is why I've been doing Vox a
lot, but she hasn't been putting out. My guild alone is too small to handle
Gorenaire, unfortunately.

Damn, main gauche is sweet. I have the pre-patch Crysanthemum Katana, which
is nothing special. Kinda pissed at Verant for not retroing the VP loot
changes, but I did get a Claw of Phara Dar last time he died. I think I'd
rather have the gauche as I try to avoid offensive proccers, but that's just
me.

Sartori{Legion}
57th Troubador
Veeshan
